name: The Half
description:
The game is created by You Jin Song

*This is a The Newschool: Parsons student's project*

Who is the text adventure lovers! Experience the universe where there is combat between mermaids and humans!

It’s like the real world, except, humans use magical powers stored in the hearts of mermaids instead of electricity. 

The nation of this world is called Hamsrock and the ruling capital is called Atstall.
